features.title: Easy to Use
features.description: Docusaurus was designed from the ground up to be easily installed and used to get your website up and running quickly.

features.title: Focus on What Matters
features.description: Docusaurus lets you focus on your docs, and we'll do the chores. Go ahead and move your docs into the docs directory.

features.title: Powered by React
features.description: Extend or customize your website layout by reusing React. Docusaurus can be extended while reusing the same header and footer.
